snippet: It’s been said that what Nepal grows best are mountains, but the people living below the Himalayas have developed delicious dishes of grains, nuts, meats and vegetables.
abstract: M H Reed reviews Jewel of Himalaya restaurant in Yorktown Heights (Metropolitan/Westchester).
lead_paragraph: It’s been said that what Nepal grows best are mountains, but the people living below the Himalayas have developed delicious dishes of grains, nuts, meats and vegetables.
